Great British Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood has garnered the attention of Great British Bake Off fans with his package.

The silver fox, 53, shared the incredibly racy snap with his 257K followers on Instagram via his stories on Tuesday.

In the photograph, the baker looked seductive as he posed for the camera in a dark shirt and jeans.

TV sensation Paul simply captioned the social media post: "On duty."

The Great British Bake Off star has never been one to shy away from the limelight so his relaxed facial expression and posture says it all.

(Image: Instagram)

The chef is known for making crude sexual innuendos on The Great British Bake Off.

Back in 2014, he was left red-faced when he made a sexual gaffe on stage during his British Baking Tour.

He started talking about "my lad" to the crowd, who by this time were in heaps of laughter and wrongly assumed he was referring to his bulge.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Instagram/summermonteysfullam)

(Image: Facebook)

It comes after his recent split with former barmaid Summer Monteys-Fullam in August.

But the pair are beginning to move on from the split as Paul made his move on a young barmaid who bears striking similarities to Summer last week.

Meanwhile, his ex Summer, 24, has been keeping herself busy by chasing her dreams of becoming a social media influencer.

The barmaid has been making her mark on the reality star world.

She has been attending the hottest movie premieres and sharing snaps from her lavish lunches on Instagram.

Summer has also thrown herself into work as she has recently teased her mysterious acting gig.
description: Paul, 53, posed for a seductive photograph yet Great British Bake Off fans were distracted by his bulge
